archimate:Goal.name: Implement a common Vulnerability Management program by end of Q1 2023 using the ServiceNow vulnerability module
archimate:Goal.documentation:
Implement a Vulnerability Management program for securing information and measuring security in common way and make it visual for both Tietoevry and customers.
Increase security and patching quality Minimize attack vectors by being up to date Increase Critical and zero-day response Find status quo and being up to date Focus on Zero-day sub process
Create a VM process Analyse Prioritize vulnerability criticality Implement Follow up Create VM policy and guidelines Establish roles and responsibilities for execution. Installing and setting up the Service Now VM/VR module
